short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your tasks. Receive end of working time notifications.
short.pl: Śledź swoje zadania. Otrzymuj powiadomienia o końcu czasu pracy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows you to increase work efficiency by tracking time of your tasks. You can manage a list of your tasks, export it to text file and enter your work time limit in configuration, so you'll be notified at the end of that time.

Source code:
https://bitbucket.org/varabi/vi-time-tacker
long.pl:
The extension allows you to increase work efficiency by tracking time of your tasks. You can manage a list of your tasks and enter your work time limit in configuration, so you'll be notified at the end of that time.

Source code:
https://bitbucket.org/varabi/vi-time-tacker
